name: Tele-LeechX
description: A Powerful Telegram Torrent (and YouTube-DL) Leecher based on Pyrogram. Powered by @FuZionX and @FuZionXLeech

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this value from @BotFather by Making New Bot and Paste the API token.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: Should be an integer. The BOT API ID of the Telegram Group, Where the Bot should work., Put Group ID. Multiple ID separated by Single Space

OWNER_ID.description: Should be an integer. ID of owner of bot. Get it by sending /info to @MissRose_Bot

TOGGLE_DOC.description: Enter your custom toggle command like toggledoc1@botname and so on. Default is /toggledoc.

TOGGLE_VID.description: Enter your custom toggle command like togglevid1@botname and so on. Default is /togglevid.

RENAME_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom rename command like rename1@botname and so on. Default is /rename.

LOG_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom log command like log1@botname and so on. Default is /log.

STATUS_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom status command like status1@botname and so on. Default is /status.

LEECH_ZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom zip command like archive1@botname and so on. Default is /leexhzip.

LEECH_UNZIP_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom unzip command like extract@botname and so on. Default is /leechunzip.

ARIA_TWO_STARTED_PORT.description: Should be an integer. The port on which aria2c daemon must start, and keep listening.

EDIT_SLEEP_TIME_OUT.description: Should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before editing a message. Put between from 6 - 15 else the Bot Crashes ðŸ¥²

MAX_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TORRENTS_TO_START.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to Wait before Cancelling a torrent.

FINISHED_PROGRESS_STR.description: Should be a Single Character. Get any Cool Icon.

UN_FINISHED_PROGRESS_STR.description: Should be a Single Character. Get any Cool Icon.

TG_OFFENSIVE_API.description: should be an URL accepting the FormParams {i}, {m}, and {t}

LEECH_COMMAND.description: Enter your Custom leech command like leech1@botname and so on. Default is /leech

SAVE_THUMBNAIL.description: For Custom Save thumbnail Command. Default is /savethumbnail

CLEAR_THUMBNAIL.description: For Custom Delete Thumbnail Command. Default is /clearthumbnail

YTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom ytdl command like ytdl1@botname and so on. Default is /ytdl.

PYTDL_COMMAND.description: Enter your custom pytdl command like pytdl1@botname and so on. Default is /pytdl.

GET_SIZE_G.description: Enter your custom getsize command like getsize@urgroupname and so on. Default is /getsize.

RCLONE_CONFIG.description: Enter your copied text from rclone config. Compulsory for /gleech as well as /tleech command

DESTINATION_FOLDER.description: Enter your Cloud folder NAME(not IDðŸ˜…) in which you want to upload/store your files.

CUSTOM_FILE_NAME.description: Fill with name you want to prefix the file name like ur channel usernameðŸ™Š, keep empty for do nothing, but add to ur config vars even without input.

SPEEDTEST.description: For Custom Speedtest Command. Default is /speedtest
